src_original: ehīti proktaḥ sa jinena muṇḍo pātrī susaṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ /
sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthau bhikṣuḥ subhūtiḥ sugataprabhāvāt* // KDA_324 //  saccittalabdhaḥ sa muneḥ prasādāt prayujyamāno vyaharat samādhau /
kleśāṃś ca sarvān pravihāya saṃyataḥ sākṣāc ca so 'rhann abhavan maharddhikaḥ // KDA_326 //
bhindann avidyādrim ivāṇḍakośaṃ prāpadabhijñāḥ pratisaṃvidaś ca // KDA_327 //
satkāralābheṣu parāṅmukatvāt saśakradevāsuramānuṣāṇām* /  pūjyaś ca mānyo abhivādanīyo babhūva sa brahmavihāracārī // KDA_328 //
